email_chain.subject: Freight Offer: Iron Ore - Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Laura,

I hope this email finds you well. We are pleased to offer a shipment of Iron Ore from Tubarão to Qingdao.

Commodity: Iron Ore
Quantity: 180,000 MT
Load Port: Tubarão
Discharge Port: Qingdao
Incoterms: CIF
Vessel: MV OCEAN HORIZON
Freight: USD 22.50/MT
Laycan: 20-25 Oct 2023

Please let us know your thoughts at your earliest convenience.

Best regards,
James Wilson
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Iron Ore - Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi James,

Thank you for the offer. USD 22.50/MT seems a bit high given the current market. Could you consider revising the rate to USD 21.00/MT?

Also, could you provide details on the vessel's DWT and LOA?

Best regards,
Laura Smith
Cargo Charterers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Iron Ore - Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for your prompt response. The MV OCEAN HORIZON has a DWT of 200,000 and an LOA of 300m.

Regarding the rate, we can offer a revised rate of USD 21.75/MT. This is our best offer considering the current market conditions.

Please let us know if this works for you.

Best regards,
James Wilson
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Iron Ore - Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi James,

USD 21.75/MT is still a bit higher than we were hoping for. Could you consider USD 21.25/MT? We are also flexible with the laycan and could extend it to 22-27 Oct if that helps.

Best regards,
Laura Smith
Cargo Charterers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Iron Ore - Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

We can agree to USD 21.25/MT with the extended laycan of 22-27 Oct. Please confirm if this works for you, and we will proceed with the recap.

Best regards,
James Wilson
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Iron Ore - Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi James,

USD 21.25/MT and the extended laycan of 22-27 Oct works for us. Please send over the recap.

Best regards,
Laura Smith
Cargo Charterers

email_chain.subject: Confirmed: Iron Ore - Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Great! Recap attached. Thank you for your business.

Commodity: Iron Ore
Quantity: 180,000 MT
Load Port: Tubarão
Discharge Port: Qingdao
Incoterms: CIF
Vessel: MV OCEAN HORIZON
Freight: USD 21.25/MT
Laycan: 22-27 Oct 2023

Best regards,
James Wilson
Maritime Brokers
